title: How does one find their writing voice? - Writing & Blogging - Quora

response.answer_text: It is like finding your own voice in general. Start writing, it would be hard for a while, and after you excel it you will get the feeling.
Describe how you feel about something that you are most passionate about, or something what you are most worried, upset or afraid of, something that carries emotion with with your words.
By being true to themselves, writing from their heart and soul, and not comparing their writing to others.
